## Simulation
```{r simulation}
    vecteur = rep(0, 50)
    for (i in 1:50){
      myseed = set.seed(i)
      syn_ctree = syn(df, method = "ctree", seed = myseed)
      syn_cart = syn(df, method = "cart", seed = myseed)
      syn_para = syn(df, method = "parametric", seed = myseed)
      u_ctree = utility.gen(syn_ctree, df)

      vecteur[i] = u_ctree$pMSE
    }

    moy_ctree = mean(vecteur)

    cat("La moyenne du pMSE est de :", moy_ctree)

    # Moyenne cumulée du pMSE 
    cum_avg = cumsum(vecteur) / seq_along(vecteur)
    plot(1:50, cum_avg, type = "l", main = "Moyenne cumulée du pMSE sur 50 synthétisations", xlab = "Nombre de synthétisations", ylab = "Moyenne cumulée du pMSE")
    lines(1:50, rep(mean(vecteur), 50), type = "l", col = "red")
```
